To those who click the startup and nothing happens, this usually happens when your videocard is not supported by the game. I know because I had the same problem when I bough BIA EIB. Check and make sure your comp can handle it =)

If you search on google " Can you run it" you will come to a website where you can shoose a game, and the website will test if you caomputer can handle the game. Then you can see if you dont got enough good videocard or something like that....

LINK :-------->           http://www.systemrequirementslab.com/referrer/srtest
